abstract: New York Mets are considering prospects Matt Reynolds and Daniel Muno to replace Daniel Murphy at second base if his hamstring injury does not heal quickly enough; former starting shortstop Ruben Tejada is still looking to earn role in Mets infield; other Mets news noted.
lead_paragraph: Matt Reynolds and Daniel Muno are being considered as potential replacements for Daniel Murphy if his hamstring does not heal quickly enough

headline.main: Mets’ Ruben Tejada and Two Prospects Vie for Infield Jobs
headline.print_headline: Tejada and Two Prospects Vying for Infield Postings

snippet: Matt Reynolds and Daniel Muno are being considered as potential replacements for Daniel Murphy if his hamstring does not heal quickly enough
